verses.verse: וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> The word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> came again unto me saying

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> Son אָדָ֕ם <S%H120><s%> of man שִׂ֥ים <S%H7760><s%> set פָּנֶ֖יךָ <S%H6440><s%> thy face אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> toward בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> the sons עַמּ֑וֹן <S%H5983><s%> of Ammon וְהִנָּבֵ֖א <S%H5012><s%> and prophesy עֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H5921><s%> against

וְאָֽמַרְתָּ֙ <S%H559><s%> And say לִבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> to the sons עַמּ֔וֹן <S%H5983><s%> of Ammon שִׁמְע֖וּ <S%H8085><s%> Hear דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> the word אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> of the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD כֹּה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֡ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD יַעַן֩ <S%H3282><s%> Because אָמְרֵ֨ךְ <S%H559><s%> Because thou saidst הֶאָ֜ח <S%H1889><s%> Aha אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and against מִקְדָּשִׁ֣י <S%H4720><s%> against my sanctuary כִֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> when נִחָ֗ל <S%H2490><s%> when it was profaned וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and against אַדְמַ֤ת <S%H127><s%> and against the land יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> when נָשַׁ֔מָּה <S%H8074><s%> when it was desolate וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and against בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> and against the house יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> when הָלְכ֖וּ <S%H1980><s%> when they went בַּגּוֹלָֽה׃ <S%H1473><s%> into captivity

לָכֵ֡ן <S%H3651><s%> therefore הִנְנִי֩ <S%H2005><s%> I am going נֹתְנָ֨ךְ <S%H5414><s%> Behold therefore I will deliver לִבְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> thee to the men קֶ֜דֶם <S%H6924><s%> of the east לְמֽוֹרָשָׁ֗ה <S%H4181><s%> for a possession וְיִשְּׁב֤וּ <S%H3427><s%> and they shall set טִירֽוֹתֵיהֶם֙ <S%H2918><s%> their palaces בָּ֔ךְ וְנָ֥תְנוּ <S%H5414><s%> in thee and make בָ֖ךְ מִשְׁכְּנֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H4908><s%> their dwellings הֵ֚מָּה <S%H1992><s%> they יֹאכְל֣וּ <S%H398><s%> in thee they shall eat פִרְיֵ֔ךְ <S%H6529><s%> thy fruit וְהֵ֖מָּה <S%H1992><s%> like יִשְׁתּ֥וּ <S%H8354><s%> and they shall drink חֲלָבֵֽךְ׃ <S%H2461><s%> thy milk

וְנָתַתִּ֤י <S%H5414><s%> And I will make אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רַבָּה֙ <S%H7237><s%> Rabbah לִנְוֵ֣ה <S%H5116><s%> a stable גְמַלִּ֔ים <S%H1581><s%> for camels וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> and the sons עַמּ֖וֹן <S%H5983><s%> of Ammon לְמִרְבַּץ־ <S%H4769><s%> a couchingplace צֹ֑אן <S%H6629><s%> for flocks וִֽידַעְתֶּ֖ם <S%H3045><s%> and ye shall know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> that אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> that I [am] the LORD ס

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> For כֹ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> For thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD יַ֚עַן <S%H3282><s%> Because מַחְאֲךָ֣ <S%H4222><s%> Because thou hast clapped יָ֔ד <S%H3027><s%> [thine] hands וְרַקְעֲךָ֖ <S%H7554><s%> and stamped בְּרָ֑גֶל <S%H7272><s%> with the feet וַתִּשְׂמַ֤ח <S%H8055><s%> and rejoiced בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all שָֽׁאטְךָ֙ <S%H7589><s%> with all thy despite בְּנֶ֔פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> in heart אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> against אַדְמַ֖ת <S%H127><s%> against the land יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

לָכֵ֡ן <S%H3651><s%> therefore הִנְנִי֩ <S%H2005><s%> behold נָטִ֨יתִי <S%H5186><s%> Behold therefore I will stretch out אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יָדִ֜י <S%H3027><s%> mine hand עָלֶ֗יךָ <S%H5921><s%> against וּנְתַתִּ֤יךָ־ <S%H5414><s%> upon thee and will deliver [לְבַג כ] (לְבַז֙ <S%H897><s%> spoil ק) לַגּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> to the heathen וְהִכְרַתִּ֙יךָ֙ <S%H3772><s%> and I will cut thee off מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הָ֣עַמִּ֔ים <S%H5971><s%> from the people וְהַאֲבַדְתִּ֖יךָ <S%H6><s%> and I will cause thee to perish מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הָאֲרָצ֑וֹת <S%H776><s%> out of the countries אַשְׁמִ֣ידְךָ֔ <S%H8045><s%> I will destroy וְיָדַעְתָּ֖ <S%H3045><s%> thee and thou shalt know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> that אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> that I [am] the LORD ס

כֹּ֥ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD יַ֗עַן <S%H3282><s%> Because אֲמֹ֤ר <S%H559><s%> do say מוֹאָב֙ <S%H4124><s%> that Moab וְשֵׂעִ֔יר <S%H8165><s%> and Seir הִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold כְּכָֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַגּוֹיִ֖ם <S%H1471><s%> [is] like unto all the heathen בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> Behold the house יְהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> of Judah

לָכֵן֩ <S%H3651><s%> therefore הִנְנִ֨י <S%H2005><s%> I am going פֹתֵ֜חַ <S%H6605><s%> Therefore behold I will open אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כֶּ֤תֶף <S%H3802><s%> the side מוֹאָב֙ <S%H4124><s%> of Moab מֵהֶ֣עָרִ֔ים <S%H5892><s%> from the cities מֵֽעָרָ֖יו <S%H5892><s%> from his cities מִקָּצֵ֑הוּ <S%H7097><s%> [which are] on his frontiers צְבִ֗י <S%H6643><s%> the glory אֶ֚רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the country בֵּ֣ית הַיְשִׁימֹ֔ת <S%H1020><s%> Bethjeshimoth בַּ֥עַל מְע֖וֹן <S%H1186><s%> Baalmeon [וְקִרְיָתְמָה כ] (וְקִרְיָתָֽיְמָה׃ <S%H7156><s%> Kiriathaim ק)

לִבְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> Unto the men קֶ֙דֶם֙ <S%H6924><s%> of the east עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> along בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> to the sons עַמּ֔וֹן <S%H5983><s%> of Ammon וּנְתַתִּ֖יהָ <S%H5414><s%> and will give לְמֽוֹרָשָׁ֑ה <S%H4181><s%> them in possession לְמַ֛עַן <S%H4616><s%> so לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not תִזָּכֵ֥ר <S%H2142><s%> may not be remembered בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> the sons עַמּ֖וֹן <S%H5983><s%> of Ammon בַּגּוֹיִֽם׃ <S%H1471><s%> among the nations

וּבְמוֹאָ֖ב <S%H4124><s%> upon Moab אֶעֱשֶׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> And I will execute שְׁפָטִ֑ים <S%H8201><s%> judgments וְיָדְע֖וּ <S%H3045><s%> and they shall know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> that אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> that I [am] the LORD ס

כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD יַ֣עַן <S%H3282><s%> Because עֲשׂ֥וֹת <S%H6213><s%> hath dealt אֱד֛וֹם <S%H123><s%> Because that Edom בִּנְקֹ֥ם <S%H5358><s%> by taking נָקָ֖ם <S%H5359><s%> vengeance לְבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> against the house יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וַיֶּאְשְׁמ֥וּ <S%H816><s%> and hath greatly אָשׁ֖וֹם <S%H816><s%> offended וְנִקְּמ֥וּ <S%H5358><s%> and revenged בָהֶֽם׃

לָכֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> therefore כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> Therefore thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD וְנָטִ֤תִי <S%H5186><s%> I will also stretch out יָדִי֙ <S%H3027><s%> mine hand עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against אֱד֔וֹם <S%H123><s%> upon Edom וְהִכְרַתִּ֥י <S%H3772><s%> and will cut off מִמֶּ֖נָּה <S%H4480><s%> at אָדָ֣ם <S%H120><s%> man וּבְהֵמָ֑ה <S%H929><s%> and beast וּנְתַתִּ֤יהָ <S%H5414><s%> from it and I will make חָרְבָּה֙ <S%H2723><s%> it desolate מִתֵּימָ֔ן <S%H8487><s%> from Teman וּדְדָ֖נֶה <S%H1719><s%> and they of Dedan בַּחֶ֥רֶב <S%H2719><s%> by the sword יִפֹּֽלוּ׃ <S%H5307><s%> shall fall

וְנָתַתִּ֨י <S%H5414><s%> And I will lay אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נִקְמָתִ֜י <S%H5360><s%> my vengeance בֶּאֱד֗וֹם <S%H123><s%> upon Edom בְּיַד֙ <S%H3027><s%> by the hand עַמִּ֣י <S%H5971><s%> of my people יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel וְעָשׂ֣וּ <S%H6213><s%> and they shall do בֶאֱד֔וֹם <S%H123><s%> in Edom כְּאַפִּ֖י <S%H639><s%> according to mine anger וְכַחֲמָתִ֑י <S%H2534><s%> and according to my fury וְיָֽדְעוּ֙ <S%H3045><s%> and they shall know אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נִקְמָתִ֔י <S%H5360><s%> my vengeance נְאֻ֖ם <S%H5002><s%> saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> GOD פ

כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD יַ֛עַן <S%H3282><s%> Because עֲשׂ֥וֹת <S%H6213><s%> have dealt פְּלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <S%H6430><s%> Because the Philistines בִּנְקָמָ֑ה <S%H5360><s%> by revenge וַיִּנָּקְמ֤וּ <S%H5358><s%> and have taken נָקָם֙ <S%H5359><s%> vengeance בִּשְׁאָ֣ט <S%H7589><s%> with a despiteful בְּנֶ֔פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> heart לְמַשְׁחִ֖ית <S%H4889><s%> to destroy אֵיבַ֥ת <S%H342><s%> hatred עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> [it] for the old

לָכֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> therefore כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> Therefore thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD הִנְנִ֨י <S%H2005><s%> behold נוֹטֶ֤ה <S%H5186><s%> Behold I will stretch out יָדִי֙ <S%H3027><s%> mine hand עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <S%H6430><s%> upon the Philistines וְהִכְרַתִּ֖י <S%H3772><s%> and I will cut off אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כְּרֵתִ֑ים <S%H3774><s%> the Cherethims וְהַ֣אֲבַדְתִּ֔י <S%H6><s%> and destroy אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁאֵרִ֖ית <S%H7611><s%> the remnant ח֥וֹף <S%H2348><s%> coast הַיָּֽם׃ <S%H3220><s%> of the sea

וְעָשִׂ֤יתִי <S%H6213><s%> And I will execute בָם֙ נְקָמ֣וֹת <S%H5360><s%> vengeance גְּדֹל֔וֹת <S%H1419><s%> great בְּתוֹכְח֖וֹת <S%H8433><s%> rebukes חֵמָ֑ה <S%H2534><s%> upon them with furious וְיָֽדְעוּ֙ <S%H3045><s%> and they shall know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> that אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> that I [am] the LORD בְּתִתִּ֥י <S%H5414><s%> when I shall lay אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נִקְמָתִ֖י <S%H5360><s%> my vengeance בָּֽם׃ ס
